alert.note: Alert for Barton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 8:44PM CDT until September 23 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Barton County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 843 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Liberal, or 7 miles west of Lamar, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. Quarter size hail was reported in Liberal Missouri. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lamar, Golden City, Lamar Heights, Irwin, Milford, Kenoma, Oakton, Iantha, Verdella and Boston. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 60 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
